meanings.definition: A class of nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs used to treat pain and inflammation.
meanings.sent1: Veterinarians sometimes prescribe phenylbutazones for horses with joint pain.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother takes phenylbutazones for her arthritis.
meanings.sent3: The phenylbutazones at the pharmacy were having a party to celebrate their pain-relieving abilities.
meanings.sent4: The phenylbutazones acted like superheroes, fighting off the inflammation invaders in the body.
meanings.sent5: I imagined the phenylbutazones as tiny warriors battling the pain dragon in my knee.

meanings.definition: The plural form of phenylbutazone, a medication used to relieve pain and inflammation.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed two phenylbutazones to be taken daily.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy more phenylbutazones from the pharmacy.
meanings.sent3: The phenylbutazones in the bottle were having a race to see who could relieve pain faster.
meanings.sent4: The phenylbutazones were like a team of pain fighters, working together to bring relief.
meanings.sent5: I pictured the phenylbutazones as tiny helpers inside my body, fixing all the pain spots.
